warezcdn.name: Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru: Dances with the Dragons
warezcdn.title: Dances with the Dragons

imdb.title: Dances with the Dragons
imdb.plot: Combining chemistry with weapons to create a powerful spell-like magic, bounty hunters Gaius and Gigina have their work cut out for them.

episodes.title: Calamitous Song of Jushiki and Swords
episodes.plot: Gayus and Gigina are two Jushikiists struggling to make ends meet amidst cuts to their pay and Gigina's spending. They learn of a string of murders, where the victims are always Jushikiists.

episodes.title: The Cardinal's Celebration
episodes.plot: Gayus and Gigina are tasked with protecting Cardinal Mouldeen, who is in town as a "tourist" - but something doesn't quite add up.

episodes.title: Weaver of Light
episodes.plot: Gigina and Gayus are tasked with serving as bodyguards for His Eminence Mouldeen.

episodes.title: Ballet of the Winged
episodes.plot: Gayus is visited at the hospital by Mouldeen and Helodel in what appears to be a gesture of friendship, but the mood changes quite abruptly.

episodes.title: Goddess of Revenge
episodes.plot: Gayus and Gigina are locked in a battle against Mouldeen's men before another familiar, but even more formidable, foe emerges.

episodes.title: Bad Omen
episodes.plot: A string of attacks by Magatsushiki raises concerns within the city. Gayus and Gigina are dragged into the escalating situation.

episodes.title: Invitation to an Evening Party
episodes.plot: A man named Zhuo Lu appears at the hostage exchange where Remedius was to be brought home.

episodes.title: Calm Days and Lonely Nights
episodes.plot: Largonkin and the Jushikiist agency vow to avenge the people slain by Great Magatsushikis Amupura and Janahn Ghalan.

episodes.title: Revelation of Malice
episodes.plot: Amupura and Janahn Ghalan's evening party draws near. They pay the agency a visit.

episodes.title: Guillotine of Spiders, Time of Snakes
episodes.plot: The battle against Amupura and Janahn Ghalan begins. Even with the entire might of the agency, things look grim.

episodes.title: Endgame of Sand
episodes.plot: Gayus, Gigina and the gang engage in a drinking game. Things get out of hand.

episodes.title: And Yet, We...
episodes.plot: Gayus thinks back to the old days, when he was a still rash, inexperienced Jushikiist who hadn't yet let learned to trust others.
